scripts.generic: func() { /usr/bin/cp ../ts-ra-config/config."$1".json config/config.json && SSL_CERT=${SSL_CERT:=/certs/localhost.crt} SSL_KEY=${SSL_KEY:=/certs/localhost.key} npx tsx src/index.ts; } ; func
scripts.book: cp ../ts-ra-config/config.book.json config/config.json && SSL_CERT=${SSL_CERT:=/certs/localhost.crt} SSL_KEY=${SSL_KEY:=/certs/localhost.key} npx tsx src/index.ts
scripts.desk: cp ../ts-ra-config/config.desk.json config/config.json && SSL_CERT=${SSL_CERT:=/certs/localhost.crt} SSL_KEY=${SSL_KEY:=/certs/localhost.key} npx tsx src/index.ts
scripts.carpark: cp ../ts-ra-config/config.carpark.json config/config.json && SSL_CERT=${SSL_CERT:=/certs/localhost.crt} SSL_KEY=${SSL_KEY:=/certs/localhost.key} npx tsx src/index.ts
scripts.testing_collection: cp ../ts-ra-config/config.testing.json config/config.json && SSL_CERT=${SSL_CERT:=/certs/localhost.crt} SSL_KEY=${SSL_KEY:=/certs/localhost.key} npx tsx src/index.ts
scripts.test_server: cp ../ts-ra-config/config.test.json config/config.json && SSL_CERT=/certs/localhost.crt SSL_KEY=/certs/localhost.key CONNECTION_STRING=mongodb://test1:1test@127.0.0.1:27017/test npx tsx src/index.ts
scripts.test: concurrently --names "SERVER, SCRIPT" --prefix-colors "bgGreen.bold,bgMagenta.bold" "npm run test_server" "npm run test_script"
